title: THOUGHT / APOCALYPSE COP
description:
Shivers is all about being an Apocalypse Cop.

Thou art the harbinger of doom, embrace thine destiny.

dialogueTree.title: Half Light: "Tremble. THE TIME IS NOW. τὰ ὅλα."
dialogueTree.text: Tremble. THE TIME IS NOW. τὰ ὅλα.

links.title: Half Light: "Time for THE SHOW. For τὰ ὅλα. The..."
links.text: Time for THE SHOW. For τὰ ὅλα. The hallowed time of fear and disintegration. A countdown has begun. All will collapse on itself. The world will disappear into a single grain of blackness. All sound will be muted. All life will scream.

links.title: Half Light: "οῦ λόγου δ' ἐόντος ξυνοῦ ζώουσιν οἱ..."
links.text: οῦ λόγου δ' ἐόντος ξυνοῦ ζώουσιν οἱ πολλοὶ ὡς ἰδίαν ἔχοντες φρόνησιν.

links.title: You: "Wait, wait -- when did this *countd..."
links.text: Wait, wait -- when did this *countdown* begin?

links.title: Half Light: "Monday morning. The moment you arri..."
links.text: Monday morning. The moment you arrived in this reality. You are the first crack in the sheer face of god. From you it will spread.

links.title: You: "This is because of the insane world..."
links.text: This is because of the insane world-ending I've been saying isn't it? (Proceed.)

links.title: Half Light: "Yes. You spoke the words of the παλ..."
links.text: Yes. You spoke the words of the παλίντροπος, and the houses of Perikarnassis. Items, people, even WORDS will tumble, all will lose its meaning in the coming years. That is why you marked yourself.

links.title: You: "Am I sure it's not just a joke, or..."
links.text: Am I sure it's not just a joke, or some kind of coping mechanism?

links.title: Half Light: "It's *totally* also a coping mechan..."
Half Light: "So you should be. The world island..."
links.text: So you should be. The world island crumbles at your feet and in the far plain -- παλίντροπος.

links.title: Volition: "Perhaps -- just a thought -- this h..."
links.text: Perhaps -- just a thought -- this has something to do with the hangover?

links.title: You: "I *do* think the world might end so..."
links.text: I *do* think the world might end soon. (Opt in.)

links.title: Half Light: "The face of the woman fractures. Th..."
links.text: The face of the woman fractures. There will be herd killing. We all become vapour.

links.title: You: "Uhm... yeah, I'm going to opt out o..."
links.text: Uhm... yeah, I'm going to opt out of the 'παλίντροπος' whatever it is. This was a mistake. (Opt out.)

links.title: Half Light: "Okay, yes. Maybe it *is* just the h..."
links.text: Okay, yes. Maybe it *is* just the hangover talking. Or some kind of joke you're playing on yourself instead of working on the case...

links.title: You: "Yeah... I don't think the time is *..."
links.text: Yeah... I don't think the time is *now*. Later maybe. [Leave.]

links.title: Half Light: "No. You cannot *leave*. The countdo..."
links.text: No. You cannot *leave*. The countdown has not yet reached XERO.
